title: Spoil your Darling
subtitle: Peek inside their diaries, read their secrets, and send the gifts they dream of.

discreetShipping.title: Discreet Shipping
discreetShipping.tooltip: All packages arrive in unmarked, fully discreet packaging to protect your privacy.

privateGifting.title: Private Gifting
privateGifting.tooltip: Choose whether to reveal your identity or send your gifts anonymously.

securePayments.title: Secure Payments
securePayments.tooltip: Your payment information is protected with bank-level encryption.

trustedWorldwide.title: Trusted Worldwide
trustedWorldwide.tooltip: Thousands of satisfied customers around the world trust us.
